#summary Overview of available tutorials

= Tutorials =
  * [AlignmentTutorial Alignment Tutorial] Tutorial using Bilingual Alignment. Introducing: 
    * local features, 
    * deterministic cardinality constraints, 
    * global predicates, 
    * feature collection, 
    * online learning, 
    * testing
    * inspection
  * [SRLTutorial Semantic Role Labelling Tutorial] Tutorial using Semantic Role Labelling. Introducing: 
    * global weighted constraints, 
    * real-valued formulae, 
    * more inspections.
